name: Mechavania
description:
Solo submission for Mecha Jam 2. Only a proof of concept, not a finished game.

Gameplay

Destroy the rocks, collect the jetpack, jump into the mech, retrieve the data packages.

The idea is to have different areas of the map that can only be accessed when you have the correct equipment/mech to access them.

Controls

ARROW KEYS - Movement and aiming, X - Fire

Assets

Mech and tileset created during the jam, recycled effects and sounds from other projects. Human is strongly based off Gun Hazard.
